passages.text:
You are at a foot of a cave. You enter. Immediately, you encounter a foot at the road. Which passge do you take?
[[Go to the left->Left]]
[[Go to the right->Right]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text:
As you walk, you quickly come afoot to a large gap on the floor. It goes so far down, you can't even seem to see the bottom of it. Looking ahead, you can see an edge of clif leading to some more ground. You think you might be able to jump across, but you are not entireluy sure if you can do it.
Do you want to go back to where its safe or do you try to jump the gap on the floor?
[[Go back->Start]]
[[Try to jump across->Platform]]
passages.name: Left

passages.text:
It doesn't take very long for you to find yourself face-to-face with a wall. It looks as if it was the result of a cave in. Inspecting it a little closer, through its cracks,  you can see what appears to be light! You think you're strong enough to be able to push some of those rocks out of the way to make an opening, but you also imagine that you might hurt your hands in the process of it...
[[Do you want to go back to the start?->Start]]
[[Or do you try to make an opening?->Puzzle]]

links.name: Do you want to go back to the start?
Or do you try to make an opening?

passages.name: Right

passages.text:
You somehow make it. You see a chest and you open it. There is a sword inside! You decide to take it with you.
As you move forward, you come across an abnoramlly large spider. You could try to sneak around it or you could attack it using your newfound sword.
[[Attack the spider!->Attacked]]
[[Sneak past->Sneaked]]
passages.name: Platform

passages.text: You attack the spider and somehow defeat it! You continue onward unscathed!
passages.name: Attacked

passages.text: Unfortunately, stealth is not one of your strengths, and you accidentally kick a rock a little too hard and alert the spider to your presence. You start running as fast as you can and you can hear the spider start chasing you.
passages.name: Sneaked

passages.text:
This is the Puzzle room. You need to complete a puzzle here, but we don't need it for right now.
[[This is where you go when you complete the puzzle successfully->Lair]]
[[This is where you go when you fail the puzzle->Death]]

links.name: This is where you go when you complete the puzzle successfully
This is where you go when you fail the puzzle

passages.name: Puzzle
